DOC.brief_summary: This study investigates if Parathyroid Tissues Anatomic Localizations Are Displaced Downward in Parathyroid Hyperplasia Cases or not.
DOC.brief_title: "Parathyroid Tissues Anatomic Localizations Are Displaced Downward in Parathyroid Hyperplasia Cases"
DOC.detailed_description: Parathyroid tissues gets heavier when they become Hyperplasia. Because of this weight change, they change their normal anatomic positions. 125 patients who have been operated earlier will be included in the study.
DOC.criteria: Patients who have undergone an operation due to parathyroid hyperplasia
